body.p: HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade is a carrier-grade distribution of OpenStack, the leading open source cloud computing platform.
HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade provides communications service providers (CSPs) with an open source based cloud platform that meets their demanding reliability requirements.

li.p: The KVM-Region Administrator Guide is addressed to HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade administrators responsible for the following areas:
Creating and maintaining resources used by end users (tenants), such as virtual machines, storage pools, network objects, and access credentials.
Operating and maintaining components of the HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade product, such as clusters, nodes, system software, licensing files, and backup and restore facilities
The Administer Guide also contains specific tasks, such as logging, backup/restore, switch configuration, and configuring a multiple data center environment.
The Operations Guide introduces the Horizon interface with specific information on how to use Horizon to operate HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade on a day-to-day basis.
These topics describe the supported OpenStack Service and contain links to the respective OpenStack CLI and API documentation.

The API and SDK reference provides links to supported API and custom OpenStack API extensions. The page also links to the HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade Software Development Kit (SDK) documentation.
